#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#define L int
#define LL long long int
#define S(x) scanf("%lld",&x) ;
#define Sd(x,y) scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y) ;
#define tc() long long int t ; scanf("%lld",&t) ; while(t--)
#define P(x) printf("%lld\n",x) ;
using namespace std ;
 
 
// This is me  :)
 
L main()
{
	tc()
	{
		 LL n ;
         S(n)
		(n%2==0 && n!=0)?printf("Yes\n"):printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0 ;
}
